targets.query:
from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |>last()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (int(v: r._value) * -1) + 100 }))

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_iowait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
    |> last()

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |>last()

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_threads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |>last()

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "cached" or r["_field"] == "free" or r["_field"] == "buffered")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user" or r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_softirq" or r["_field"] == "usage_steal" or r["_field"] == "usage_nice" or r["_field"] == "usage_irq" or r["_field"] == "usage_iowait" or r["_field"] == "usage_guest" or r["_field"] == "usage_guest_nice")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "running" or r["_field"] == "blocked" or r["_field"] == "sleeping" or r["_field"] == "stopped" or r["_field"] == "zombies" or r["_field"] == "paging" or r["_field"] == "unknown")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kernel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "context_switches")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "free")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["path", "device","fstype"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "inodes_total" or r["_field"] == "inodes_used" or r["_field"] == "inodes_free")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "inodes_total" or r["_field"] == "inodes_used" or r["_field"] == "inodes_free")
  |> group(columns: ["path","device"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes")
   |> derivative(unit: ${inter}, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_time" or r["_field"] == "write_time")
   |> derivative(unit: ${inter}, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_bytes" or r["_field"] == "read_bytes")
 |> derivative(unit: ${inter}, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> derivative(unit: ${inter}, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "packets_recv" or r["_field"] == "packets_sent")
  |> derivative(unit: ${inter}, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "netstat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tcp_close" or r["_field"] == "tcp_close_wait" or r["_field"] == "tcp_closing" or r["_field"] == "tcp_established" or r["_field"] == "tcp_fin_wait1" or r["_field"] == "tcp_fin_wait2" or r["_field"] == "tcp_last_ack" or r["_field"] == "tcp_syn_recv" or r["_field"] == "tcp_syn_sent" or r["_field"] == "tcp_time_wait")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "tcp_outrsts" or r._field == "tcp_activeopens" or r._field == "tcp_estabresets" or r._field == "tcp_passiveopens")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${inter}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: ${inter}, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "drop_in" or r["_field"] == "drop_out")
  |> derivative(unit: ${inter}, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "err_in" or r["_field"] == "err_out")
  |> derivative(unit: ${inter}, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /^(cpu|mem|system|net|disk|processes)$/)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Server
list.name: server

query.query:
from(bucket: "${datasource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /^(cpu|mem|system|net|disk|processes)$/)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
